content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with coal as fuel and currently no ingredients to smelt.

### Stone Furnace Factory
Consists of:
- 1 Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) and 1 Stone furnace (position (2, 0)).

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The error indicates that the inventory is full, which prevents the insertion of items.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that there are enough items in the furnace to extract. The error indicates that there are not enough iron plates in the furnace to extract.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that all required ingredients are available in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. The error indicates that the required iron plates for crafting transport belts are not available.

### Errors related to crafting machines
- Ensure that you have the necessary crafting machines available and that they are properly set up to craft the required items.
